scenario: Alice received the following amounts during the year: Life Insurance Proceeds (Death): $22,915.18, Dividends: $31,906.44, Wages: $6,001.96, Interest on Bank Account: $41,766.91, Return of Capital: $21,557.40.
question: Calculate Alice's gross income under I.R.C. § 61.
answer_explanation: Gross income includes all income from whatever source derived, unless excluded. Total: $79,675.31.
reasoning: Summed included items, ignored excluded items.
